title: Wikus Groenewald
text:
Wikus Christian Groenewald (born ) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Rugby%20ATL">Rugby ATL</a> of <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> (MLR). His regular position is at prop.
He previously played for the in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> and the <a href="Rugby%20Challenge%20%28South%20Africa%29">Rugby Challenge</a>.
He made his <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> debut for the Pumas in July 2019, coming on as a replacement prop in their opening match of the <a href="2019%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2019 season</a> against the .
In March 2021, as <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID19</a> restrictions were relaxed, he joined <a href="Rugby%20ATL">Rugby ATL</a> in <a href="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>, <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>.
